statements: SELECT appointment_id, patient_id, doctor_id, appointment_date, appointment_duration FROM Appointments;
SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE doctor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT patient_id, appointment_date FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT doctor_id, appointment_duration FROM Appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, appointment_duration FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_duration < '2 hours';
SELECT * FROM Appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC, appointment_duration ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date FROM Appointments WHERE doctor_id = '9876' AND appointment_date >= '2022-09-01' ORDER BY appointment_date ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_appointments FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2022-09-30'
SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE patient_id IN ('1234', '5678', '9101') AND doctor_id = '5432' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC
SELECT appointment_id, doctor_id, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM appointment_date) AS appointment_year FROM Appointments WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM appointment_date) = 12
SELECT * FROM appointments;
SELECT patient_name, doctor_name, appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE consultation_type = 'Follow-up';
SELECT doctor_name, hospital_name FROM doctors;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, hospital_name FROM doctors ORDER BY specialization ASC;
SELECT appointment_id, patient_name, doctor_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, doctor_name, appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE consultation_type = 'Follow-up' AND consultation_status = 'Completed';
SELECT doctor_name, COUNT(*) AS total_appointments FROM appointments GROUP BY doctor_name ORDER BY total_appointments DESC;

SELECT appointments.appointment_id, appointments.patient_name, doctors.specialization FROM appointments JOIN doctors ON appointments.doctor_name = doctors.doctor_name WHERE appointments.appointment_date >= '2022-06-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_future_appointments FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date > CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT * FROM appointments;
SELECT patient_name, doctor_name, appointment_date FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM doctors WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT appointment_id, patient_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE appointment_status = 'Scheduled';
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_status = 'Scheduled';
SELECT appointment_id, patient_name, doctor_name, appointment_date FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_email FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, available_days FROM doctors WHERE doctor_name LIKE '%Doe%';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_email FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty FROM doctors WHERE doctor_specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date = '2022-12-01';
SELECT appointment_id, doctor_id FROM appointments LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM appointments;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE doctor_id = '1234';
SELECT patient_name, patient_email, patient_phone FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty FROM doctors WHERE doctor_specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY appointment_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name ASC;
SELECT provider_id, first_name, last_name, specialty FROM TelehealthProviders WHERE specialty = 'Psychology';
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT appointment_id, provider_id, patient_id, appointment_date FROM Appointments WHERE status = 'Scheduled' ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
SELECT service_name, description, price FROM TelehealthServices WHERE price > 50.00 ORDER BY service_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM TelehealthProviders WHERE specialty = 'Dermatology';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Patients ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT provider_id, COUNT(appointment_id) AS total_appointments FROM Appointments GROUP BY provider_id;
SELECT service_name, price FROM TelehealthServices WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, history_date, actions FROM AppointmentHistory WHERE actions IN ('Cancelled', 'Rescheduled') ORDER BY history_date DESC;
